subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Matt White, a former Butler track athlete who has amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, commonly known as Lou Gehrig’s disease, will watch Butler play its first Final Four game.
snippet: Matt White, a former Butler track athlete who has amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, commonly known as Lou Gehrig’s disease, will watch Butler play its first Final Four game.
